publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1356.2 Mary Scanlon: Community Care-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1356) in the name of Nicola Sturgeon, leave out from "notes" to end and insert "agrees that the best way forward is the eventual implementation of the Sutherland Commission's recommendation of free personal care, and urges the Scottish Executive to monitor the use of new monies allocated to local authorities for community care in light of winter pressure to ensure that the elderly receive the appropriate care and support. Supported by: Ben Wallace*, Alex Fergusson*, Alex Johnstone*
